title: Vel'Koz is feeling left out
body: I feel bad for my bud, Vel'Koz. The last skin he got was over a year ago and it was 750 RP. Before that, his last skin was a 1350, which is good, but it's over two years old. Vel'Koz may be unpopular, but that doesn't mean that our poor voidling friend should be left out from this frenzy of new skins.

replies.body: lol he only has 2 skins what are u talking about arclight and battle cast there isn't a third 750 skin
Idk, i think the guy is just crazy.
I think you missed the joke
I absolutely agree. I want a new Vel'Koz skin too. Preferably an ultimate skin as a reward for his history of balance.
